name: Tradematic Cloud API
description: Tradematic Cloud is a back-end infrastructure for building investment and trading apps. It’s a powerful algorithmic trading engine + API + ready-made adapters to stock and forex brokers, crypto exchanges, and market data providers. 12+ exchanges, 5 asset classes, 150 indicators. You can use it as a cloud API, or you can deploy it on your servers. See examples of applications to build with Tradematic Cloud at https://tradematic.cloud
